title: Meet the CDC Officials Who Added the mRNA Shot to the Official Childhood Schedule
itunes:title: Meet the CDC Officials Who Added the mRNA Shot to the Official Childhood Schedule
description:
In a shocking story we've been warning you about here on The Charlie Kirk Show, the CDC voted today (just shortly after the recording of this episode, though the outcome was a foregone conclusion) to add the COVID-19 “vaccine” onto the official childhood immunization schedule. Charlie goes through the list of the 15 CDC officials who voted unanimously to approve the experimental vaccine, and after you hear their backgrounds this outcome will all start to make perfect sense.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
